translation.en: Emily!
translation.zh: 艾米丽

translation.en: You're the medical examiner?
translation.zh: 你就是验尸官？

translation.en: Mr. Rose?
translation.zh: 罗丝先生？

translation.en: I'm sorry, Mr. Rose...
translation.zh: 很抱歉 罗丝先生

translation.en: ...but I cannot state conclusively...
translation.zh: 我没法下结论

translation.en: ...that the cause of death was natural.
translation.zh: 说这是自然死亡

translation.en: Your daughter, she....
translation.zh: 你的女儿 她…

translation.en: Excuse me, Father?
translation.zh: 抱歉 神父？

translation.en: Father Moore.
translation.zh: 摩尔神父

translation.en: You'll have to come with me.
translation.zh: 请你跟我来一下

translation.en: -Father Moore! -Will you plead guilty?
translation.zh:
-摩尔神父…
-你会认罪吗？

translation.en: -Tell us about the exorcism! -Over here, Father Moore!
translation.zh:
-神父 讲讲驱魔的过程
-这边 摩尔神父

translation.en: We're at Crescent County Courthouse. We show you Father Richard Moore....
translation.zh:
这里是克雷桑县法庭
这位就是理查德摩尔神父…

translation.en: -What about the parents? -They're not talking to the police.
translation.zh:
-受害者父母呢？
-他们不想与警方沟通

translation.en: Do we charge them?
translation.zh: 他们会被起诉吗？

translation.en: No. Even the priest admits he ran the show.
translation.zh: 不会 神父本人承认是他进行了驱魔

translation.en: We need a Christian on this.
translation.zh: 这件案子里 我们需要一位基督徒

translation.en: Preferably a Catholic.
translation.zh: 天主教徒更好

translation.en: Somebody that knows this shit inside out...
translation.zh: 一个了解驱魔内情

translation.en: ...and who the public will see as unbiased.
translation.zh: 却又在公众眼中不失偏颇的人物

translation.en: We're going after a holy man here.
translation.zh: 我们可是在起诉一位神职人员

translation.en: Ethan Thomas.
translation.zh: 伊桑托马斯

translation.en: He's not Catholic, though. Methodist, I think.
translation.zh:
不过他不是天主教徒
我记得他是卫理公会教派的

translation.en: But the guy practically lives at church. Choir, teaches Sunday school.
translation.zh:
不过他几乎就住在教堂里
参加唱诗班 在主日学校教书

translation.en: He's no choirboy in the courtroom. I've seen him tear people up.
translation.zh:
在法庭上他可不是唱诗班歌手
我见过他把人打败得体无完肤

translation.en: He's a shrewd son of a bitch.
translation.zh: 这家伙是个鬼机灵

translation.en: All right, pull him off whatever he's doing. He's lead prosecutor.
translation.zh:
那好 让他马上停下手头的事
前来担任首席检察官

translation.en: There's ambition. She never stops. She even works while she drinks.
translation.zh:
野心勃勃 她前进的脚步一刻不停
哪怕喝酒的时候也在工作

translation.en: -Gentlemen, you know Erin Bruner. -Of course.
translation.zh:
-各位 她就是艾琳布鲁勒
-没错

translation.en: -Hello. -I was so sure Van Hopper would fry...
translation.zh:
-大家好
-我本以为范霍珀死路一条

translation.en: ...but you proved me wrong, lady.
translation.zh: 但你证明了我是错的 女士

translation.en: The system worked, that's all.
translation.zh: 体制的功劳 就是这样

translation.en: Gentlemen, you'll excuse us, will you?
translation.zh: 请各位稍等

translation.en: Have you seen the news about this priest?
translation.zh: 你看了关于这位神父的新闻吗？

translation.en: I heard something about an exorcism gone bad, but I don't know the details.
translation.zh:
我听说驱魔仪式出差错了
但并不了解详情

translation.en: The DA charged him with negligent homicide.
translation.zh: 地方检察官控告他过失杀人

translation.en: They offered a very reasonable plea bargain, but the priest turned it down.
translation.zh:
他们提出了公道的认罪协议
神父本人拒绝了 卡尔 别让我接这个…

translation.en: Do not ask me to take this--
translation.zh: 卡尔 别让我接这个…

translation.en: The archdiocese specifically requested you.
translation.zh: 大主教管区特别点名要你辩护

translation.en: -Why me? -They followed the Van Hopper trial.
translation.zh:
为什么选我？ 因为他们像大家一样
关注了范霍珀的庭审

translation.en: They think you're smart...
translation.zh: 他们觉得你非常聪明

translation.en: ...and convincing.
translation.zh: 而且有说服力

translation.en: They want you to ask the priest to reconsider.
translation.zh: 他们希望你劝说神父重新考虑

translation.en: Well, what if he won't?
translation.zh: 如果他不愿意呢？

translation.en: This sounds like a quagmire. If I'm smart, I'll leave it alone.
translation.zh:
简直就是泥沼
如果我聪明 就该避之不及才对

translation.en: Erin, the Van Hopper case got you back on the fast track.
translation.zh: 艾琳 范霍珀案让你迅速东山再起

translation.en: Once again, you're a rising star.
translation.zh: 你再一次成为冉冉升起的明星

translation.en: -Chivas, neat, please. -Tanqueray martini, dry.
translation.zh:
-请给我纯威士忌
-添加利干马提尼

translation.en: -What are you saying? -I'm saying, you do this for me...
translation.zh:
-你想说什么？
-这次你助我一臂之力

translation.en: ...and the rising star keeps rising.
translation.zh: 你的前途就一直一片光明

translation.en: The case is yours.
translation.zh: 这个案子非你莫属

translation.en: And just how high do I get to rise this time?
translation.zh: 我这次能升到什么程度？

translation.en: I've been junior partner for too long now, Karl.
translation.zh: 我做初级合伙人太久了 卡尔

translation.en: -It's not like other firms haven't called. -Erin--
translation.zh:
-我也接到过其他邀约
-艾琳

translation.en: I want my name on the door, right next to yours.
translation.zh:
我要你旁边的办公室
门上印上我的名字

translation.en: Okay.
translation.zh: 成交

translation.en: Try to get the deal.
translation.zh: 让神父认罪

translation.en: If the priest won't and this goes to trial...
translation.zh: 如果神父拒绝 案子走上法庭

translation.en: ...the archdiocese feels he could be an embarrassment.
translation.zh: 大主教管区会因为他而很难堪的

translation.en: So under no circumstances is he to testify.
translation.zh: 所以绝对别让他出庭作证

translation.en: No, of course. If I'd put Van Hopper on the stand...
translation.zh: 当然不会 如果我让范霍珀出庭

translation.en: ...he'd be marking time on death row instead of sunbathing in Miami.
translation.zh:
他现在就在死牢里数日子了
而不是在迈阿密晒日光浴

translation.en: His tab.
translation.zh: 这位付钱

translation.en: Good morning, I'm Erin Bruner.
translation.zh: 早上好 我是艾琳布鲁勒

translation.en: May I sit down?
translation.zh: 可以坐下吗？

translation.en: They brought the chair for my public defender.
translation.zh: 椅子是给我的公诉辩护律师坐的

translation.en: I guess they left it when they decided I wasn't going to kill myself with it.
translation.zh: 看我应该也不会用它自杀才留下的

translation.en: My firm represents the archdiocese.
translation.zh: 我的事务所代表大主教管区

translation.en: Yes.
translation.zh: 没错

translation.en: Yes, I was expecting them to send someone.
translation.zh: 的确 我有预期他们派人过来

translation.en: -Why did they choose you? -I wanted this case.
translation.zh:
-为什么选你？
-是我选了这个案子

translation.en: -So you like the spotlight? -I'm used to it.
translation.zh:
-那你就是想出名？
-我已经习惯镁光灯了

translation.en: I defended James Van Hopper.
translation.zh: 我为詹姆斯范霍珀辩护过

translation.en: And now you've come to further your celebrity.
translation.zh: 那么你是想靠这个案子增加名气

translation.en: No.
translation.zh: 不

translation.en: I'm here to make senior partner at my firm.
translation.zh: 是为了成为律所的高级合伙人

translation.en: -Are you a Catholic? -No.
translation.zh:
-你是天主教徒吗？
-不是

translation.en: I'm an agnostic, I guess. I'm not really sure.
translation.zh: 我是不可知论者吧 我也不确定

translation.en: If you're not sure, then you are one.
translation.zh: 如果你不确定 那就是了

translation.en: I don't think you're the right attorney. I'll stick with my public defender.
translation.zh:
我觉得让你来负责不合适
还是找公诉辩护律师吧

translation.en: He can't get the DA to get you a better deal. I can.
translation.zh: 他没法争取到更好的协议 我能

translation.en: I won't be making any plea agreement.
translation.zh: 我不会接受任何认罪协议的

translation.en: If you don't, the archdiocese won't post your bail.
translation.zh:
如果你不接受
大主教管区不会保释你的

translation.en: You'll be stuck in here for the trial.
translation.zh: 你就得待在这里直到庭审

translation.en: Do you understand how long they can put you away?
translation.zh: 你知道可能会被关多久吗？

translation.en: It's been explained to me.
translation.zh: 他们跟我解释过

translation.en: The DA's office doesn't like it when religion holds itself above the law.
translation.zh:
地方检察官可不喜欢
宗教凌驾于法律之上

translation.en: And this prosecutor, Ethan Thomas?
translation.zh: 还又遇到检察官伊桑托马斯

translation.en: You're gonna need somebody hungry and smart...
translation.zh: 你需要一个渴望成功、聪明

translation.en: ...and aggressive to even have a chance.
translation.zh: 有进取之心的人才能有赢的机会

translation.en: What would your strategy be to defend me against such a formidable man?
translation.zh: 你有何策略能在强敌面前为我辩护？

translation.en: -That depends. -On what?
translation.zh:
-这取决于某个因素
-取决于什么？

translation.en: On how you wanna be defended.
translation.zh: 你有多想得到辩护

translation.en: What's your main concern, other than staying out of jail?
translation.zh: 你主要担心什么？除了牢狱之灾以外

translation.en: -Is it how you're being portrayed? -I don't care about my reputation.
translation.zh:
-是你在媒体里的形象吗？
-我不在乎名声

translation.en: I'm not afraid of jail.
translation.zh: 我也不怕坐牢

translation.en: What I care about is telling Emily Rose's story.
translation.zh: 我在乎的是讲述艾米丽罗丝的故事

translation.en: I want people to hear what only I can tell.
translation.zh: 我想让听众听听只有我能讲的故事

translation.en: And what is that?
translation.zh: 什么故事？

translation.en: What really happened to Emily...
translation.zh: 艾米丽故事的真相

translation.en: ...and why.
translation.zh: 以及原因

translation.en: If I let you defend me...
translation.zh: 如果我让你为我辩护

translation.en: ...will you promise to let me testify and tell the truth about what happened?
translation.zh: 你能答应让我作证并讲述事实吗？

translation.en: And what is the truth you would tell? That the ritual killed her?
translation.zh: 你想讲什么事实？仪式害死了她？

translation.en: -Was it your fault she died? -No.
translation.zh:
-她的死亡是你的过错吗？
-不是

translation.en: All right. Then I'll let you tell her story.
translation.zh: 很好 那我答应给你讲故事的机会

translation.en: But only if you agree to let me do whatever else it takes to win.
translation.zh:
但你必须允许我
努力做任何可能令我们胜诉的事

translation.en: You're not used to this kind of place.
translation.zh: 你不常来这种地方

translation.en: I'm sure our life is very strange to you.
translation.zh: 我们的生活方式在你看来肯定很奇怪

translation.en: Not so strange.
translation.zh: 没有那么怪

translation.en: I grew up in a little town.
translation.zh: 我在一个小镇上长大

translation.en: But our house wasn't as nice or as big as this.
translation.zh: 没有这里好 也没有这里大

translation.en: My mother, she raised me alone.
translation.zh: 妈妈独自抚养我长大

translation.en: She was a schoolteacher, so we had very little money.
translation.zh: 她是学校教师 所以我家没什么积蓄

translation.en: What a wonderful thing to be.
translation.zh: 多好的一个职业

translation.en: That was Emily's dream, to be a teacher.
translation.zh: 艾米丽的梦想就是成为教师

translation.en: That's why she went away to the university.
translation.zh: 所以她才去了那所大学

translation.en: A lot of cats live here.
translation.zh: 这里有很多猫

translation.en: There are...
translation.zh: 现在大概…

translation.en: ...11 now, I think.
translation.zh: 有11只

translation.en: Emily always brought them home.
translation.zh: 艾米丽总会把它们带回家

translation.en: Ever since she was a little girl, she couldn't leave a stray abandoned.
translation.zh: 她从小就会照顾这些流浪小动物

translation.en: Before these troubles began...
translation.zh: 在这一切发生前

translation.en: ...was Emily a happy girl?
translation.zh: 艾米丽快乐吗？

translation.en: Oh, yes.
translation.zh: 很快乐

translation.en: Before she went away to university...
translation.zh: 在她去大学之前

translation.en: ...my Emily was so very happy.
translation.zh: 我的艾米丽是那么快乐

translation.en: What is going on--? Girls!
translation.zh: 怎么了？姑娘们

translation.en: Mama.
translation.zh: 妈妈

translation.en: Is it--?
translation.zh: 这是…

translation.en: It's a scholarship, Mama.
translation.zh: 这是奖学金 妈妈

translation.en: They pay for it. They pay for everything.
translation.zh: 学校付钱 学校支付一切费用

translation.en: This is your dream, Emily.
translation.zh: 这是你的梦想 艾米丽

translation.en: You'll be leaving us.
translation.zh: 你要离开我们了

translation.en: It's okay.
translation.zh: 没关系

translation.en: I'll be okay.
translation.zh: 我会照顾自己

translation.en: I'm gonna show this to your father.
translation.zh: 我把这个拿给你爸爸看

translation.en: -Counselor. Thanks for meeting me. -Sure.
translation.zh:
-感谢与我见面 律师
-那是自然

translation.en: Can I buy you a drink, Mr. Thomas? He makes an excellent martini.
translation.zh:
能请你喝点什么吗？托马斯先生
他调的马提尼特别棒

translation.en: Just water for me, please.
translation.zh: 我要水就好了 谢谢

translation.en: So...
translation.zh: 那么…

translation.en: ...the judge thinks we should offer a new plea agreement.
translation.zh: 法官认为我们该提出新的认罪协议

translation.en: She feels the community might be better served without this trial.
translation.zh: 她认为不开庭 对社会更好

translation.en: How do you feel about it?
translation.zh: 你的感觉呢？

translation.en: Personally.
translation.zh: 就说个人的

translation.en: My job is to represent the interests of the people...
translation.zh: 我的职责是代表人民的利益

translation.en: ...and make an effort to be objective.
translation.zh: 尽量保持客观

translation.en: I ask because I know you're a churchgoer.
translation.zh: 我这么问是因为你常去教堂

translation.en: Now you're set to prosecute a man of God.
translation.zh: 现在你却不得不检举神职人员

translation.en: Your priest broke the law...
translation.zh: 神父违反了法律

translation.en: ...and a young girl is dead.
translation.zh: 一个年轻的女孩失去生命

translation.en: If he's a man of God, then, personally, I think he's even more subject...
translation.zh:
如果他是神职人员 我个人觉得
他更加受制于道德准则的约束和惩罚

translation.en: ...to the laws of moral behavior. If it were up to me, he'd get no deal.
translation.zh:
如果他是神职人员 我个人觉得
他更加受制于道德准则的约束和惩罚 如果我能说了算 他拿不到认罪协议

translation.en: And forgiveness and compassion? Isn't that part of your creed?
translation.zh:
原谅和同情呢？
是你信条的一部分吗？

translation.en: Or does that just get in the way of your work?
translation.zh: 还是这只会妨碍到你工作？

translation.en: If you have compassion for your client...
translation.zh: 如果你同情委托人

translation.en: ...you'll persuade him to accept this:
translation.zh: 那你就说服他接受

translation.en: Charges reduced to reckless endangerment.
translation.zh: 鲁莽危害行为的罪名

translation.en: Twelve months in a county jail.
translation.zh: 在县监狱待12个月

translation.en: Reducible to six, plus probation, if he stays out of trouble.
translation.zh:
如果他不惹事
还能减少到六个月和保释

translation.en: Somehow I expect he can manage that.
translation.zh: 我希望他能够接受

translation.en: But please understand me. If he refuses, I will seek the maximum.
translation.zh:
但请理解我的苦衷
如果他拒绝 我将把量刑最大化

translation.en: Father Moore has made it clear there will be no plea agreement.
translation.zh: 摩尔神父明确表示不接受认罪协议

translation.en: He will not lie or admit to something he is not guilty of.
translation.zh: 他不撒谎 也不会承认没犯过的罪行

translation.en: -And he was never neglectful of Emily. -"Never neglectful"?
translation.zh:
-他从没忽视艾米丽
-“从没忽视”？

translation.en: Have you seen the postmortem photographs?
translation.zh: 你没看尸检照片吗？

translation.en: We'll go to trial. My client wants the public to know the truth.
translation.zh:
我们要上庭
我的委托人希望公众了解实情

translation.en: Good.
translation.zh: 很好

translation.en: So do I.
translation.zh: 我也是

translation.en: Have a good night, counselor.
translation.zh: 晚安 律师

translation.en: Let the record show that the defendant and his counsel are present...
translation.zh: 记录被告及代理人出席

translation.en: ...and that the jury is seated.
translation.zh: 陪审团就坐

translation.en: -Mr. Thomas, you may begin. -Thank you, Your Honor.
translation.zh:
-托马斯先生 你可以开始
-谢谢 法官阁下

translation.en: Good morning, ladies and gentlemen. My name is Ethan Thomas.
translation.zh:
先生们 女士们 早上好
我是伊桑托马斯

translation.en: I'm the assistant district attorney, and I represent the people.
translation.zh: 我是助理地区检察官 代表人民

translation.en: In the case before you, the evidence will show...
translation.zh: 你们面前的这个案子 证据会显示

translation.en: ...that the victim had a serious medical condition that demanded treatment.
translation.zh: 受害人身体状况很差 需要治疗

translation.en: We will prove that the victim's condition rendered her physically...
translation.zh: 我们也会证明受害人的状况 令她从精神和物质上

translation.en: ...and psychologically incapable of caring for herself.
translation.zh: 令她从精神和物质上 都无法照顾自己

translation.en: Her care...
translation.zh: 而她把自己

translation.en: ...was then wholly entrusted...
translation.zh: 完全地托付给了

translation.en: ...to that man, the defendant, Father Richard Moore.
translation.zh: 那个人 被告 理查德摩尔神父

translation.en: She became his responsibility...
translation.zh: 他有责任照顾她

translation.en: ...and he betrayed that responsibility...
translation.zh: 但他并没有履行责任

translation.en: ...by persuading her to abandon her medical treatment...
translation.zh: 因为他劝说受害人放弃药物治疗

translation.en: ...in favor of religious treatment:
translation.zh: 而选择了宗教治疗

translation.en: A ritual exorcism, performed by the defendant...
translation.zh: 即驱魔仪式 由被告实行

translation.en: ...allegedly to cure the victim by ridding her of demonic forces.
translation.zh: 据说有帮助她摆脱恶魔侵害的作用

translation.en: We will demonstrate that this course of action...
translation.zh: 我们也会向各位展示 这种行为

translation.en: ...directly resulted in the victim's death.
translation.zh: 直接导致了受害人死亡

translation.en: I said a moment ago that I represent the people.
translation.zh: 我刚刚说过 我代表人民

translation.en: We all know what that means, but it's a little abstract, isn't it?
translation.zh: 我们都明白大意 但有点抽象 对吧？

translation.en: Miss Bruner, the attorney for the defense...
translation.zh: 布鲁勒小姐 被告的辩护律师

translation.en: ...is seated right next to the man she represents.
translation.zh: 就坐在她委托人的右边

translation.en: And I stand here to represent the people.
translation.zh: 我站在这里 代表的是人民

translation.en: That's not really why I stand here today.
translation.zh: 其实这不是我站在这里的真正原因

translation.en: I'm here on behalf of someone who can't sit at a table...
translation.zh: 我代表的是一个无法坐在这里的人

translation.en: ...and look at you every day and gain your sympathy...
translation.zh: 她无法每天看着你们 获得同情

translation.en: ...someone who can't take the stand to testify...
translation.zh: 没有办法出庭作证

translation.en: ...and tell you what happened in her own words.
translation.zh: 亲自告诉你们发生了什么

translation.en: A young girl...
translation.zh: 一个年轻的女孩

translation.en: ...that could've been your daughter.
translation.zh: 可能就是各位的女儿

translation.en: Could've been mine.
translation.zh: 也可能是我的女儿

translation.en: A girl who trusted Father Richard Moore with her life.
translation.zh: 将性命托付给摩尔神父的女孩

translation.en: This is what she looked like...
translation.zh: 这是她的照片

translation.en: ...before the defendant began his religious treatment.
translation.zh: 在接受被告人的宗教治疗前

translation.en: This is a photograph taken of her on the day that she died.
translation.zh: 这是她去世当天的照片

translation.en: I stand here for Emily Rose...
translation.zh: 我代表艾米丽罗丝

translation.en: ...who died horribly...
translation.zh: 她在19岁

translation.en: ...at age 19.
translation.zh: 悲惨死去

translation.en: You won't be able to see Emily sitting here day after day during this trial.
translation.zh: 庭审中 你无法看到艾米丽每天出席

translation.en: But I hope you'll remember her as she was when she was alive...
translation.zh: 但我希望各位记得她活着的样子

translation.en: ...and full of...
translation.zh: 当时她充满着…

translation.en: ...hopes and dreams.
translation.zh: 希望和梦想

translation.en: And as she was when Father Richard Moore was finished with her...
translation.zh: 还有等到理查德摩尔神父完成仪式

translation.en: ...and left her to die.
translation.zh: 放任她死去的样子

translation.en: Thank you.
translation.zh: 谢谢

translation.en: Is the defense prepared to make its opening statement?
translation.zh: 被告方准备好做开庭陈词了吗？

translation.en: I'd like to reserve my opening statement...
translation.zh: 法官阁下 我想保留这个机会

translation.en: ...until the presentation of the defense's case.
translation.zh: 等到陈述被告方观点的时候

translation.en: As is your privilege.
translation.zh: 这是你的权利

translation.en: Prosecution may begin.
translation.zh: 开始诉讼

translation.en: That was already my plan.
translation.zh: 已经在我计划之中

translation.en: Thank you, Your Honor. The people call Dr. Edith Vogel.
translation.zh:
谢谢 法官阁下
人民传唤伊迪斯沃格尔医生

translation.en: I've known Emily her entire life. I took care of all of the Rose girls.
translation.zh:
艾米丽一出生我就认识她
我照顾着所有罗丝家的女孩

translation.en: Can you describe Emily as you knew her growing up?
translation.zh: 你能描述一下艾米丽的成长经历吗？

translation.en: She was a bit sickly in her early years.
translation.zh: 小时候她有点虚弱

translation.en: She stayed inside a lot, reading, learning music.
translation.zh: 总是在家里待着 读书 学音乐

translation.en: How did she feel about going to school?
translation.zh: 她对去学校的看法呢？

translation.en: Objection. The witness is not a psychiatrist.
translation.zh: 反对 证人不是精神病学家

translation.en: I'll rephrase. Did you talk to Emily about going off to college?
translation.zh:
我改述
你跟艾米丽聊过去大学的事吗？

translation.en: Yes. She told me she was excited...
translation.zh: 聊过 她说自己很开心

translation.en: ...but nervous that she would be away from her family in the big city.
translation.zh: 但又害怕远离家人去陌生的大城市

translation.en: This was an overwhelming change for her.
translation.zh: 这个变化对她来说很大

translation.en: Did you stay in touch after she went away?
translation.zh: 她离开后你们有保持联系吗？

translation.en: Yes. She wrote me a letter saying that she'd been to a dance...
translation.zh: 有 她给我写信说自己去参加舞会

translation.en: ...and she'd met a boy named Jason.
translation.zh: 遇到了一个叫杰森的男孩

translation.en: She didn't want her mother to know this...
translation.zh: 她并不想让妈妈知道

translation.en: ...because her mother did not approve of dancing...
translation.zh: 因为妈妈不允许她跳舞

translation.en: ...and had warned her about the boys at school.
translation.zh: 也提醒过她小心学校里的男孩

translation.en: Did Emily communicate with you again last fall after you received the letter?
translation.zh:
去年秋天你收到这封信后
她有再和你联络过吗？

translation.en: Actually, it was her mother.
translation.zh: 其实 她妈妈联系了我

translation.en: She telephoned me...
translation.zh: 她给我打电话

translation.en: ...waking me out of a deep sleep at 4 in the morning.
translation.zh: 凌晨4点 我正在睡梦中

translation.en: She asked me to call Emily at a payphone on the university campus.
translation.zh:
她让我给艾米丽打电话
打到校园里的一个付费电话亭

translation.en: When Emily answered, she was quite hysterical.
translation.zh: 艾米丽接电话的时候 情绪很激动

translation.en: At first, she just sobbed uncontrollably.
translation.zh: 一开始 她控制不住地大哭

translation.en: But eventually she calmed down enough to tell me what happened.
translation.zh: 但后来她恢复平静 告诉我事情经过

translation.en: She said that she was alone that weekend.
translation.zh: 她说那个周末她独自一人

translation.en: Her roommate had gone home.
translation.zh: 室友回家了

translation.en: She had awakened...
translation.zh: 她惊醒

translation.en: ...and thought she smelled something burning.
translation.zh: 好像闻到了什么烧焦的味道

translation.en: There was no alarm, but she got up...
translation.zh: 火警铃没响 但她还是起身查看

translation.en: ...afraid there was a fire.
translation.zh: 担心什么地方失火

translation.en: Dr. Mueller, what's your position at the university hospital?
translation.zh:
米勒医生
你在校医院担任什么职务？

translation.en: I am chairman of the Department of Neurology.
translation.zh: 我是神经科主任

translation.en: And after you heard about the dorm-room incident...
translation.zh: 你听到宿舍发生的这件事后

translation.en: ...what were your initial thoughts?
translation.zh: 产生了什么样的想法？

translation.en: At first, I thought perhaps Emily had taken illegal drugs.
translation.zh:
最开始 我认为艾米丽
可能服食非法毒品

translation.en: Some type of hallucinogen.
translation.zh: 某类迷幻剂

translation.en: But we ran tests and found no trace of drugs in her system.
translation.zh:
但我们进行了检查
没发现她体内有类似药物

translation.en: And the more she explained the incident to me...
translation.zh: 她告诉我的越多

translation.en: ...the more I began to suspect something else.
translation.zh: 我就越怀疑事情另有原因

translation.en: Epilepsy results from uncontrolled electrical activity in the brain.
translation.zh: 癫痫是不受控制的脑电活动造成的

translation.en: In a severe, or grand mal, seizure...
translation.zh: 严重癫痫发作时

translation.en: ...a person may lose consciousness for several minutes...
translation.zh: 病人可能会失去意识好几分钟

translation.en: ...and suffer involuntary contractions of all the muscles of the body.
translation.zh: 身体肌肉也会不自然收缩

translation.en: Is it possible for a person suffering such a seizure...
translation.zh: 一个严重癫痫发作的人是否可能

translation.en: ...to have hallucinations or perceive the things that Emily described?
translation.zh: 看到幻觉或感知到艾米丽描述的事？

translation.en: The muscle contractions could feel like an extreme pressure on the body.
translation.zh: 肌肉收缩好像身体承受了极限压力

translation.en: And it is certainly possible, with all that brain activity...
translation.zh: 那些脑活动是有可能

translation.en: ...for a person to perceive all sorts of strange and violent things.
translation.zh: 让人感觉到奇怪或者暴力的事

translation.en: So suspecting that Emily was epileptic, how did you proceed?
translation.zh: 你怀疑艾米丽癫痫发作后做了什么？

translation.en: I administered an electroencephalograph.
translation.zh: 我对她做了脑电图扫描

translation.en: What did the EEG reveal?
translation.zh: 扫描结果如何？

translation.en: It showed a possible epileptic focus in the patient's left temporal lobe.
translation.zh: 显示患者左颞叶可能有癫痫灶

translation.en: Did this require a specific treatment?
translation.zh: 需要特别治疗吗？

translation.en: Yes, I began a medication schedule for Emily with the drug Gambutrol.
translation.zh:
是的 我让艾米丽开始了药物疗程
开了名为冈布卓的药

translation.en: I also advised regular follow-up examinations and further tests.
translation.zh: 还建议她定期检查 再做几次测试

translation.en: But Emily failed to keep her follow-up appointments with me.
translation.zh: 但艾米丽后来爽约了

translation.en: She give any reason for discontinuing these appointments?
translation.zh: 她给出爽约的原因了吗？

translation.en: Yes, she told me she was convinced that her condition was a spiritual one.
translation.zh:
是的 有人说服她相信
她的问题可能出在精神方面

translation.en: It was the conviction of her priest, she said, and she shared his beliefs.
translation.zh: 她的神父这样认为 她同意他的想法

translation.en: Was it your impression that Emily had placed her care...
translation.zh: 那艾米丽是否把她个人安危

translation.en: -...entirely--? -Leading the witness.
translation.zh:
-全都…
-反对 引导证人

translation.en: Sustained.
translation.zh: 反对有效

translation.en: After the end of October...
translation.zh: 在10月末后

translation.en: ...did you ask Emily why she had stopped...
translation.zh: 你有没有问过艾米丽

translation.en: ...filling her Gambutrol prescriptions?
translation.zh: 她为何停止服用冈布卓？

translation.en: Yes. She said that Father Moore had suggested she stop taking the drug.
translation.zh: 有 她说摩尔神父建议她停药

translation.en: And what, in your medical opinion...
translation.zh: 从医生的角度看

translation.en: ...was the result of Father Moore's suggestion?
translation.zh:
患者死亡是否直接
因为摩尔神父的建议而造成的？

translation.en: I believe Father Moore's suggestion killed her.
translation.zh:
我坚决认为
是摩尔神父的建议害死了她

translation.en: Objection, Your Honor!
translation.zh: 反对 法官阁下

translation.en: The witness is asserting outrageous conclusions based on pure hearsay.
translation.zh: 证人完全根据传闻证据得出荒谬结论

translation.en: Technically correct, but I'll allow it as part of his expert opinion testimony.
translation.zh:
从法律上说是如此 但我将允许
将它归纳为专家意见证词的一部分

translation.en: Thank you, Dr. Mueller.
translation.zh: 谢谢 米勒医生

translation.en: Your witness.
translation.zh: 被告方询问证人

translation.en: You said you observed a possible epileptic focus in the temporal lobe.
translation.zh:
医生 你说观察到患者颞叶
可能有癫痫灶

translation.en: Doesn't this imply what you observed may not have been an epileptic focus?
translation.zh: 那你的观察是否有可能不是癫痫灶？

translation.en: Yes, that's also possible.
translation.zh: 没错 也有这个可能

translation.en: Would Father Moore's advice to stop taking Gambutrol be good advice...
translation.zh:
如果艾米丽没有癫痫
那么摩尔神父的让她停药的建议

translation.en: ...if Emily were, in fact, not epileptic?
translation.zh: 是否好建议呢？

translation.en: Of course. But that's not the case here. She was epileptic.
translation.zh:
当然 但在本案中并非如此
她的确癫痫发作

translation.en: Really.
translation.zh: 是吗？

translation.en: When Emily saw objects move on their own...
translation.zh: 艾米丽看到东西自己会动

translation.en: ...and felt an invisible presence on top of her...
translation.zh: 感觉到一个看不见的人压在自己身上

translation.en: ...was she experiencing symptoms typical of epilepsy?
translation.zh: 这是癫痫的症状吗？

translation.en: Not typical, no.
translation.zh: 不是典型症状

translation.en: Are they typical indications of any other conditions?
translation.zh: 那么这是其他病症的典型症状吗？

translation.en: -Say, for example, psychosis? -Yes, I would say that's correct.
translation.zh:
-比如说 精神病？
-是的 我会说是精神病

translation.en: But isn't psychosis an entirely different medical condition from epilepsy?
translation.zh:
但精神病和癫痫
是完全不同的两种病症吧？

translation.en: -Yes, in my-- -So aren't you selectively choosing...
translation.zh:
-是的 在我…
-那么你难道不是有意选择

translation.en: ...what parts of Emily's experiences fit your epilepsy diagnosis...
translation.zh: 艾米丽症状中和癫痫诊断吻合的部分

translation.en: ...while ignoring those which indicate something else?
translation.zh: 而忽略了指向其他病症的症状吗？

translation.en: -Objection. Argumentative. -Withdrawn.
translation.zh:
-反对 有争论
-我撤回

translation.en: No further questions.
translation.zh: 暂无其他问题

translation.en: We have to work fast.
translation.zh: 我们得快点

translation.en: They're only giving me an hour with you tonight.
translation.zh: 今晚他们只给我一小时和你见面

translation.en: Listen.
translation.zh: 听着

translation.en: Before we get started, there's something I have to tell you...
translation.zh: 开始之前 我有事要告诉你

translation.en: ...something I should've said to you before I let you take the case.
translation.zh: 你接下案子前 我就该告诉你的

translation.en: Okay.
translation.zh: 好吧

translation.en: There are forces surrounding this trial.
translation.zh: 庭审中有股力量环绕着

translation.en: Dark, powerful forces.
translation.zh: 黑暗、强大的力量

translation.en: Just be careful, Erin. Watch your step.
translation.zh: 务必小心 艾琳 要小心

translation.en: I see.
translation.zh: 明白了

translation.en: Look--
translation.zh: 听着

translation.en: Father, you don't have to worry about me.
translation.zh: 神父 不要担心我

translation.en: I'm an agnostic, remember?
translation.zh: 我是不可知论者 记得吗？

translation.en: Demons exist, whether you believe in them or not.
translation.zh: 恶魔是存在的 不管你信不信

translation.en: Your involvement in this trial might just open you up to their attacks.
translation.zh:
你参与庭审可能会
将自己置于危险之中

translation.en: Look, Father, I appreciate your concern...
translation.zh: 神父 谢谢你的关心 不过…你还是多担心自己

translation.en: ...but you need to be worried about yourself.
translation.zh: 不过…你还是多担心自己

translation.en: Ethan Thomas is using the medical aspects of this case as ammunition...
translation.zh: 伊桑托马斯以医学诊断作为武器

translation.en: ...and I have to be prepared for his attacks, so...
translation.zh:
我必须要准备好对抗他的攻击
所以…

translation.en: ...with what little time we have, I think we need to focus on your defense.
translation.zh: 我们时间不多 还是专注在辩护上吧

translation.en: Now, what I need from you is more information about Emily's condition.
translation.zh: 我需要你告诉我更多艾米丽的症状

translation.en: Specific details of how it progressed after the dorm-room episode.
translation.zh:
尤其是宿舍房间事件后
她的情况有何进展

translation.en: Well, after the first incident...
translation.zh: 在第一起事件后

translation.en: ...she was sent to the university hospital for testing and observation.
translation.zh:
她被送到大学医院做检查
并留院观察

translation.en: Emily once told me that in her dorm room, she resisted the demons...
translation.zh:
艾米丽曾告诉我
她在宿舍房间里反抗了恶魔

translation.en: ...but at the hospital they overcame her.
translation.zh: 但恶魔在医院打败了她

translation.en: So she believed...
translation.zh: 所以她相信

translation.en: ...that her possession began at the hospital?
translation.zh: 自己是在医院才被附体的？

translation.en: Yeah, I think she did.
translation.zh: 对 我想是的

translation.en: And after that, things just went from bad to worse.
translation.zh: 那之后 情况就更加严重了

translation.en: Emily!
translation.zh: 艾米丽

translation.en: Emily?
translation.zh: 艾米丽？

translation.en: Oh, my God. Emily?
translation.zh: 天啊 艾米丽？

translation.en: Don't touch me.
translation.zh: 别碰我

translation.en: Jason, please...
translation.zh: 杰森 求求你

translation.en: ...don't leave me.
translation.zh: 别离开我

translation.en: And I never did leave her.
translation.zh: 我从没有离开她

translation.en: I stayed until the end.
translation.zh: 一直待到最后

translation.en: So much of what we shared was like a nightmare...
translation.zh: 我们共同的那段经历 好像噩梦

translation.en: ...but I wouldn't give up a single minute I spent with her.
translation.zh: 但我不会放弃与她相处的任何一分钟

translation.en: She woke me up, you know?
translation.zh:
你知道吗？她唤醒了我 让我感受到了以前从未感受过
也不知道自己会感受到的事物

translation.en: To things I never felt before, things I never knew I could feel.
translation.zh:
让我感受到了以前从未感受过
也不知道自己会感受到的事物

translation.en: I never knew how dead I was until I met her.
translation.zh: 遇见她 我才知道我以前是那么空洞

translation.en: --residential north metro district where James Van Hopper...
translation.zh:
地点在北部新市区的居民区 詹姆斯范霍珀
刚在一起有争议的案件中被无罪释放

translation.en: ...acquitted after a controversial trial...
translation.zh:
詹姆斯范霍珀
刚在一起有争议的案件中被无罪释放

translation.en: -Can you turn that up, please? -...has apparently struck again.
translation.zh:
-能把声音开大点吗？
-他又袭击了居民

translation.en: It was inside this quiet suburban home...
translation.zh: 就在这个宁静的郊区家庭

translation.en: ...that police say James Van Hopper murdered a young couple today.
translation.zh:
警方称詹姆斯范霍珀
于今天稍早杀害了一对年轻夫妻

translation.en: Sources close to the investigation say that Van Hopper...
translation.zh: 调查相关的线报称 4月才摆脱谋杀指控的范霍珀

translation.en: ...who was acquitted of murder charges in April...
translation.zh: 4月才摆脱谋杀指控的范霍珀

translation.en: ...may have known both of the victims.
translation.zh: 可能认识两名受害者

translation.en: Their names are being withheld pending family notification.
translation.zh: 在通知亲属前 他们的名字暂时保密

translation.en: Most glorious prince of the heavenly army...
translation.zh: 天兵中战绩辉煌的王子

translation.en: ...holy Michael, the archangel...
translation.zh: 大天使圣米迦勒

translation.en: ...defend us in battle against the princes...
translation.zh: 在对抗王子的战争中守护我们

translation.en: ...powers and rulers of darkness.
translation.zh: 免受黑暗力量及魔鬼侵袭

translation.en: Counsel Bruner, my courtroom day begins at 9:30 a.m.
translation.zh:
布鲁勒律师
我的庭审早上9点半开始

translation.en: -I'm sorry, Your Honor, I-- -Which was 17 minutes ago.
translation.zh:
-抱歉 法官阁下 我…
-也就是17分钟前

translation.en: Ready to proceed?
translation.zh: 准备好了吗？

translation.en: Yes, Your Honor.
translation.zh: 是的 法官阁下

translation.en: Dr. Briggs, please state your qualifications for the court.
translation.zh: 布里格斯医生 请向法庭说明资历

translation.en: I have advanced degrees in medicine...
translation.zh: 我拥有约翰霍普金斯大学的医学

translation.en: ...psychiatry and neurology from Johns Hopkins...
translation.zh: 精神病学和神经病学专业的高等学历

translation.en: ...and I have had three books and several dozen papers published...
translation.zh:
有三本著作 发表过多篇关于神经病学
和神经精神病学的文章

translation.en: ...in the fields of neurology and neuropsychiatry.
translation.zh:
发表过多篇关于神经病学
和神经精神病学的文章

translation.en: What was the cause of death, as determined by the autopsy?
translation.zh: 验尸结果显示 死亡原因是什么？

translation.en: The decedent expired due to a gradual shutdown of the bodily functions.
translation.zh: 死者死于身体机能逐渐失效

translation.en: Why did her body shut down?
translation.zh: 为何会出现这种情况？

translation.en: The autopsy found that it was a cumulative effect...
translation.zh: 验尸结果发现这是逐步累积成的

translation.en: ...from numerous physical traumas exacerbated by malnutrition...
translation.zh: 身体上有伤口 营养不良加剧了病症

translation.en: ...which severely inhibited her ability to recuperate from those traumas.
translation.zh: 导致她的其他伤口无法愈合

translation.en: In other words, her starving body had little or no means to recover...
translation.zh: 也就是说 她饥肠辘辘 很难或根本没法恢复承受的伤痛

translation.en: ...from the injuries it was sustaining, and so it eventually just gave out.
translation.zh: 很难或根本没法恢复承受的伤痛 所以她最后衰竭而死

translation.en: How did Emily get these injuries?
translation.zh: 艾米丽身上为什么有伤口？

translation.en: Some were the result of violent epileptic seizures...
translation.zh: 有一些是癫痫剧烈发作导致的

translation.en: ...and some were self-inflicted.
translation.zh: 有一些是自己导致的

translation.en: And why, in your opinion, did Emily injure herself...
translation.zh: 那么你认为她为何伤害自己

translation.en: ...and why did she stop eating?
translation.zh: 为什么停止进食呢？

translation.en: Upon review of her complete medical file...
translation.zh: 回顾她的完整病例档案

translation.en: ...I concluded that Emily's epilepsy had evolved...
translation.zh: 我认为艾米丽的癫痫加剧

translation.en: ...into a condition known as psychotic epileptic disorder.
translation.zh: 发展成了精神病型癫痫障碍

translation.en: This is a rare development, to be sure...
translation.zh: 当然 这是很不寻常的情况

translation.en: ...but one that I have witnessed numerous times.
translation.zh: 但我也见过很多次

translation.en: -Emily was epileptic and psychotic? -Yes.
translation.zh:
-艾米丽既有癫痫又有精神病？
-是的

translation.en: Explain how this psychotic epileptic disorder would manifest itself.
translation.zh: 请解释下精神病型癫痫障碍有何症状

translation.en: The seizures would have the symptoms of schizophrenia...
translation.zh:
癫痫发作时
患者会出现精神分裂症的症状

translation.en: ...such as auditory and visual hallucinations...
translation.zh: 例如有幻听、幻视

translation.en: ...and sometimes extreme paranoia.
translation.zh: 甚至是极端妄想症

translation.en: The seizures may lock up the joints and slightly contort the body.
translation.zh: 癫痫可能锁住了关节 让身体扭曲

translation.en: The pupils will dilate, making the eyes appear black.
translation.zh: 瞳孔扩大 让眼睛看起来很黑

translation.en: So you believe that Emily had epilepsy...
translation.zh: 所以你认为艾米丽的癫痫

translation.en: ...which developed into a form of violent psychosis...
translation.zh: 发展成了某种激烈的精神病

translation.en: ...a condition that can be controlled with Gambutrol?
translation.zh: 而冈布卓可以控制？

translation.en: Yes. And it would've been, if she'd continued her treatment.
translation.zh:
没错 如果她继续接受治疗
也不至如此

translation.en: In your opinion, if Emily had continued with her medication...
translation.zh: 你认为 如果艾米丽继续吃药的话

translation.en: -...would she be alive today? -Absolutely.
translation.zh:
-今天还会活着吗？
-当然

translation.en: If treated early, psychotic epileptic disorder is rarely fatal.
translation.zh: 及早治疗 精神病型癫痫障碍不致命

translation.en: I mean, this--
translation.zh: 我是说 这个…

translation.en: This was a very sick girl.
translation.zh: 这个女孩病很重

translation.en: The defendant should've realized that Emily was in need... ...of continued medical treatment.
translation.zh:
被告人应该知晓 当时艾米丽需要
持续的药物治疗

translation.en: Thank you, doctor. Your witness.
translation.zh: 谢谢 医生 你可以询问证人

translation.en: Doctor, you testified that Gambutrol could've controlled Emily's condition.
translation.zh:
医生 你的证词说
冈布卓可以控制艾米丽病情

translation.en: How do you know that?
translation.zh: 你如何知道的？

translation.en: It's the inevitable result of taking the drug.
translation.zh: 这是吃药后的必然结果

translation.en: It would've controlled her seizures...
translation.zh: 可以控制她的癫痫症状

translation.en: ...which were the root cause of her psychosis.
translation.zh: 而癫痫是她患上精神病的根本原因

translation.en: But wasn't Emily still experiencing psychotic symptoms...
translation.zh: 但艾米丽开始药物治疗后

translation.en: ...even after she started taking the medication?
translation.zh: 仍旧有精神病症状 不是吗？

translation.en: Yes. Because Gambutrol has a cumulative effect.
translation.zh: 因为冈布卓需要累积效应

translation.en: It takes time to build up in the system.
translation.zh: 需要一定时间才能在身体中生效

translation.en: You assume that Gambutrol would've helped her, but you don't know.
translation.zh:
所以你假定冈布卓可以救她
但实际不知道

translation.en: It's a reasonable assumption, but....
translation.zh: 这是合理假设 但是…

translation.en: No, of course, I can't be certain.
translation.zh: 不 当然 我也不确定

translation.en: Doctor, is "psychotic epileptic disorder" a common medical term...
translation.zh:
医生“精神病型癫痫障碍”
究竟是医疗名词

translation.en: ...or did you just make it up?
translation.zh: 还是你编的？

translation.en: Well, I distinguished and named the--
translation.zh: 我分辨出并命名…

translation.en: So psychotic epileptic disorder is really your own pet theory?
translation.zh:
那么精神病型癫痫障碍
就是你的自说自话吧？

translation.en: -Objection. Argumentative. -Sustained.
translation.zh:
-反对 有争议
-反对有效

translation.en: When Emily chose to stop her medical treatment...
translation.zh: 艾米丽选择停止药物治疗的时候

translation.en: ...what do you think should've been done?
translation.zh: 你认为应该怎么做？

translation.en: Upon recognizing her condition...
translation.zh: 在了解她病情的前提下

translation.en: ...I would have tranquilized her and force-fed her.
translation.zh: 我会给她打镇定 并强制她服药

translation.en: And then, if necessary...
translation.zh: 之后 如果必须

translation.en: ...I would've treated her with electroconvulsive therapy.
translation.zh: 我可能会使用电休克疗法

translation.en: Electroshock treatment. You would've done this against her will?
translation.zh: 电休克疗法 你要强迫她这么做？

translation.en: To save her life?
translation.zh: 为了救她的命？

translation.en: Absolutely.
translation.zh: 当然

translation.en: Nothing further.
translation.zh: 暂无其他问题

translation.en: The witness may step down.
translation.zh: 证人可以走出证人席

translation.en: Your Honor, I offer into evidence this photograph as People's Exhibit 3-A.
translation.zh:
法官阁下 我请求提出照片
作为编号3A的证据

translation.en: And having done so, the people rest.
translation.zh: 之后人民方举证完毕

translation.en: The photograph is entered into evidence.
translation.zh: 照片将成为证据

translation.en: We are recessed until tomorrow morning, 9:30 sharp...
translation.zh: 休庭 明天早上9点半准时开庭

translation.en: ...at which time the defense will give its opening statement...
translation.zh: 到时将由被告方做开庭陈词

translation.en: ...and call its first witness.
translation.zh: 并传唤首位证人

translation.en: I'm sorry I was late.
translation.zh: 抱歉我迟到了

translation.en: I didn't get a lot of sleep. Big power outage knocked out my alarm clock.
translation.zh: 我没睡好 大停电 我的闹钟没响

translation.en: -It won't happen again. -No, I didn't sleep either.
translation.zh:
-不会再有这种事
-不 我也没睡好

translation.en: What kept you awake?
translation.zh: 你为什么没睡好？

translation.en: Doesn't matter.
translation.zh: 没什么

translation.en: You're under attack.
translation.zh: 你受到袭击了

translation.en: What are you talking about?
translation.zh: 你在说什么？

translation.en: You're in a spiritual battle, Erin.
translation.zh: 艾琳 你陷入心灵战争里了

translation.en: The forces of darkness are trying to keep you away from the light.
translation.zh: 黑暗力量想迫使你离开光明

translation.en: Don't let them.
translation.zh: 别让他们得逞

translation.en: Don't worry about today. We're doing fine.
translation.zh: 别担心今天的事 表现很棒

translation.en: We're getting creamed. I can't believe I walked right into that.
translation.zh:
我们处境危险
真不敢相信我跳进这个泥潭

translation.en: Look, if we don't find a doctor to testify that Emily...
translation.zh:
听着 如果找不到医生作证说 艾米丽不是癫痫或精神分裂
或精神病型的癫痫

translation.en: ...wasn't epileptic or schizophrenic or schizo-epileptic, we're gonna lose.
translation.zh:
艾米丽不是癫痫或精神分裂
或精神病型的癫痫 我们就会输掉

translation.en: Care of the city's main branch and the university library...
translation.zh: 去了市立主图书馆和大学图书馆

translation.en: ...I bring you another dozen fun-filled books...
translation.zh: 我又给你带来一堆有趣的书

translation.en: ...about the demonic and the mentally deranged.
translation.zh: 关于恶魔和精神病的

translation.en: They burned women at the stake...
translation.zh: 在巫术迫害时期

translation.en: ...during witch hunts for being possessed.
translation.zh: 对认为被附体的女性施以火刑

translation.en: Glad you don't have to defend those guys.
translation.zh: 庆幸你不用为这些人辩护

translation.en: -How are we on our medical experts? -Not good.
translation.zh:
-找到医学专家了吗？
-没有

translation.en: The psychiatrist you wanted is tied up in another trial.
translation.zh:
你想找的精神病学家
正在参与另一起案件

translation.en: And the neurologist is sailing to Costa Rica.
translation.zh: 神经学家去哥斯达黎加了

translation.en: This book I'm reading, it's by an anthropologist.
translation.zh: 我读的这本书是人类学家写的

translation.en: It's about contemporary cases of possession, mostly in the Third World.
translation.zh:
附体的现代案例
主要发生在第三世界

translation.en: People there are still primitive and superstitious.
translation.zh: 那里的人很原始和迷信

translation.en: Maybe.
translation.zh: 也许

translation.en: Maybe they see possession for what it really is.
translation.zh: 或许他们才看透了附体的本质

translation.en: Maybe we've taught ourselves not to see it.
translation.zh: 或许我们是被教会了不去看到这些

translation.en: -You saying you believe in this stuff? -No.
translation.zh:
-你是想说你相信这些吗？
-不是

translation.en: Maybe we shouldn't just try to invalidate the prosecution's case...
translation.zh:
或许我们不应该
只寻找医学观点的漏洞

translation.en: ...by punching holes in the medical approach.
translation.zh: 来推翻检方的指控

translation.en: Maybe we should also try to validate the alternative.
translation.zh: 我们应该证实另一种可能性

translation.en: -Validate possession in a court of law? -Yes.
translation.zh:
-在法庭上证实附体的存在？
-没错

translation.en: Okay. I guess we could bring in some priests to talk about exorcisms--
translation.zh:
好吧 可以找些神父
来谈谈他们进行过的驱魔仪式…

translation.en: No, the archdiocese won't let us do that.
translation.zh: 不 大主教管区不会允许的

translation.en: They wanna limit the Church's exposure to Father Moore.
translation.zh: 他们想减少教会对摩尔神父的接触

translation.en: I've got three articles by the anthropologist who wrote this book.
translation.zh:
我这里有这个人类学家作者的
三篇文章

translation.en: She approaches the subject of possession...
translation.zh: 她从科学的角度去探索附体

translation.en: ...from a scientific perspective and doesn't try to debunk it.
translation.zh: 她从科学的角度去探索附体 而非试图拆穿它

translation.en: -You want me to track her down? -Yeah.
translation.zh:
-你想让我找到她？
-是的

translation.en: Keep looking for a medical expert to refute Dr. Briggs.
translation.zh:
同时继续寻找
可以反驳布里格斯医生的医学专家

translation.en: But send the case file to this Dr. Sadira Adani.
translation.zh:
把案子的宗卷
也发给沙迪娜阿达尼博士

translation.en: Ladies and gentlemen of the jury...
translation.zh: 各位陪审团成员

translation.en: ...as you know by now, my name is Erin Bruner...
translation.zh: 如你们所知 我叫艾琳布鲁勒

translation.en: ...and I represent the defendant, Richard Moore.
translation.zh: 被告理查德摩尔的辩护律师

translation.en: Mr. Thomas has contended that Emily Rose suffered... ...from a serious medical condition...
translation.zh:
托马斯先生主张艾米丽罗丝
患上严重疾病

translation.en: ...that required medical treatment, nothing more.
translation.zh: 只需要进行药物治疗

translation.en: He has asserted that any attempt by my client...
translation.zh: 他声称除了药物治疗外

translation.en: ...to help Emily by anything other than medical means...
translation.zh: 我的委托人做的任何帮助艾米丽的事

translation.en: ...was not only inappropriate, but criminally negligent.
translation.zh: 都是不恰当的 而且有忽视之罪过

translation.en: I'm now gonna ask that you keep an open mind...
translation.zh: 我希望各位保持开放心态

translation.en: ...to what our evidence and testimony will show.
translation.zh: 来面对证据和证词向你们展示的内容

translation.en: Medical treatment was not the answer for Emily...
translation.zh: 药物治疗并不能帮助艾米丽

translation.en: ...because she simply did not suffer from a medical condition.
translation.zh: 因为她不是生病了

translation.en: She was neither epileptic nor psychotic.
translation.zh: 她既没有癫痫也没有精神病

translation.en: Emily Rose's condition, in fact, was demonic possession.
translation.zh:
艾米丽罗丝的情况
其实是被恶魔附体

translation.en: An exorcism was her only hope for a cure.
translation.zh: 驱魔是她唯一可能获救的希望

translation.en: Some of you may find yourself unable to reconcile Emily's beliefs...
translation.zh: 可能有人无法理解艾米丽

translation.en: ...or those of the defendant with your own.
translation.zh: 和被告人的信仰

translation.en: You may not believe demons exist. You won't have to.
translation.zh:
你们可能不相信恶魔存在
你们不需要相信

translation.en: Because you will see that after the utter failure of doctors to help Emily...
translation.zh: 因为在医生治疗艾米丽失败之后

translation.en: ...Father Moore simply tried to help Emily in a different way...
translation.zh: 摩尔神父只是想用不同的方式来救她

translation.en: ...using an approach that he, Emily and her family firmly believed...
translation.zh:
他本人及艾米丽和家人都很相信
这种方法

translation.en: ...was her only chance for relief.
translation.zh: 是她解脱的唯一机会

translation.en: And we will show that despite his greatest efforts...
translation.zh:
我们将向各位展示
尽管他付出了卓绝的努力

translation.en: ...and his sincere love for Emily...
translation.zh: 他对艾米丽有真诚的爱

translation.en: ...there was nothing he could've done to prevent the death of Emily Rose.
translation.zh: 他却还是无法拯救艾米丽罗丝的性命

translation.en: Are you okay?
translation.zh: 你还好吗？

translation.en: Aren't you gonna eat anything?
translation.zh: 不吃点东西吗？

translation.en: She said it was terrible to hear the clinking of spoons and forks.
translation.zh: 她说听到勺子和叉子叮当作响很难受

translation.en: She was always hungry, but she said they wouldn't let her eat.
translation.zh: 她很饿 但他们不让她吃东西

translation.en: Who did she mean by "they"?
translation.zh: 她说的“他们”是指谁？

translation.en: The forces that were in control of her.
translation.zh: 那些控制她的力量

translation.en: That were inside her.
translation.zh: 在她体内

translation.en: You know, the demons.
translation.zh: 恶魔

translation.en: Tell us what else happened that night.
translation.zh: 跟我们讲讲那晚还发生了什么

translation.en: I walked her back to her dorm...
translation.zh: 我送她回宿舍

translation.en: ...and she seemed really nervous and scared.
translation.zh: 她看来非常紧张害怕

translation.en: So I held her for a while, trying to calm her down.
translation.zh: 所以我抱了她一会 想安慰她

translation.en: I fell asleep, but when I woke up, she wasn't beside me.
translation.zh: 我睡着了 但我醒来时 她不在身边

translation.en: Emily?
translation.zh: 艾米丽？

translation.en: Hey.
translation.zh: 嘿

translation.en: Can you hear me?
translation.zh: 能听到我说话吗？

translation.en: I called her father, and he told me to bring Emily home.
translation.zh:
我给她父亲打了电话
他让我送艾米丽回家

translation.en: Jason and I put Emily to bed...
translation.zh: 杰森和我把她抱到床上

translation.en: ...hoping she would sleep.
translation.zh: 希望她能睡一会

translation.en: And when did Father Moore become involved?
translation.zh: 摩尔神父何时开始参与的？

translation.en: Emily stayed home after that.
translation.zh: 那之后艾米丽就住在家中

translation.en: She didn't return to school, and she kept getting worse.
translation.zh: 她没有回学校 情况越变越糟

translation.en: Eventually, when she didn't get better, we called our priest, Father Moore.
translation.zh:
最终 她情况也没有好转
我们就请来了摩尔神父

translation.en: When he arrived, I sent my daughter Alice upstairs...
translation.zh: 他来的时候 我让女儿爱丽丝上楼

translation.en: ...to see if Emily was awake.
translation.zh: 看看艾米丽是否醒着

translation.en: Emily?
translation.zh: 艾米丽？

translation.en: Can I come in?
translation.zh: 我能进来吗？

translation.en: -Our Father, who art in heaven-- -Emily?
translation.zh:
-我们在天上的父…
-艾米丽？

translation.en: Father Moore is here. Can you come downstairs?
translation.zh:
-愿你的旨意行在地上
-摩尔神父来了 你能下楼来吗？

translation.en: --as it is in heaven.
translation.zh: 如同行在天上

translation.en: Give us this day our daily bread....
translation.zh: 我们日用的食粮 愿你今天赐给我们

translation.en: Emily, can you hear me?
translation.zh: 能听到吗？艾米丽

translation.en: Let's get her off the floor.
translation.zh: 别让她趟在地板上

translation.en: Alice, no!
translation.zh: 不要 爱丽丝

translation.en: I am the one who dwells within.
translation.zh: 我是附在她体内的

translation.en: And I am the one who comes in His name.
translation.zh: 我以上帝的名义而来

translation.en: Think you can force me out, priest?
translation.zh: 你以为可以驱逐我？神父

translation.en: Try.
translation.zh: 试试看

translation.en: I dare you.
translation.zh: 我看你不敢

translation.en: You've suffered a terrible loss, Mr. Rose. I know this is difficult.
translation.zh:
你经受了可怕损失
罗丝先生 我知道事实很难接受

translation.en: So thank you for being here today.
translation.zh: 谢谢你今天出庭

translation.en: Sir, do you often read the Bible?
translation.zh: 你会常常读《圣经》吗？

translation.en: -Yes, I do. -So do I.
translation.zh:
-是的
-我也是

translation.en: What about the DSM?
translation.zh: 读过《DSM》吗？

translation.en: The Diagnostic and Statistical Manual of Mental Disorders...
translation.zh: 《精神疾病诊断与统计手册》

translation.en: ...commonly referred to as the bible of abnormal psychiatry.
translation.zh: 通称精神病学界的《圣经》

translation.en: -Have you read that? -No.
translation.zh:
-你读过吗？
-没有

translation.en: So you're not aware that according to the DSM...
translation.zh: 那你不会知道这本手册上说

translation.en: ...a person's refusal to eat is a common indication of anorexia?
translation.zh: 拒绝吃东西是厌食症的征兆吧？

translation.en: Objection. The witness just said he hasn't read the DSM, Your Honor.
translation.zh:
反对 证人刚刚说过没读过这本手册
法官阁下

translation.en: -Sustained. -Mr. Rose...
translation.zh:
-反对有效
-罗丝先生

translation.en: ...are you aware that catatonic rigidity...
translation.zh: 你是否知道 紧张性僵直

translation.en: ...specifically a locking up of the body's joints...
translation.zh: 尤其是锁住了身体关节

translation.en: ...is a known symptom of psychosis?
translation.zh: 正是精神病的症状？

translation.en: No. I haven't studied these things.
translation.zh: 不 我没有研究过这些

translation.en: Have you ever visited an insane asylum...
translation.zh: 你是否去过疯人院

translation.en: ...or a hospital for the mentally ill?
translation.zh: 或者精神病患者住的医院？

translation.en: Once. My aunt was in one before she died.
translation.zh: 去过一次 我婶婶死前住过

translation.en: Really? So there's a history of mental illness in your family?
translation.zh: 是吗？那你家里有精神病史？

translation.en: I suppose.
translation.zh: 我想是的

translation.en: Sir, if you saw someone eating insects...
translation.zh: 先生 如果看到有人在街角吃昆虫

translation.en: ...on a street corner, would you say that that person is mentally ill?
translation.zh: 先生 如果看到有人在街角吃昆虫 你会不会觉得此人精神不正常？

translation.en: -Probably, yes. -So can you say with confidence...
translation.zh:
-可能会
-那你可不可以确定地说

translation.en: ...that the behavior you saw in your daughter's bedroom...
translation.zh: 你在女儿卧室看到的事情

translation.en: ...could not be the behavior of someone suffering from psychosis?
translation.zh: 不可能是一个精神病人的行为呢？

translation.en: I don't know. She never had any problems like that before.
translation.zh: 不知道 她以前从来没有那样过

translation.en: It just didn't feel that way to me or to Father Moore.
translation.zh: 我和摩尔神父都没有过那样的感觉

translation.en: -And you trusted him, right? -Yes.
translation.zh:
-你信任他 对吗？
-是的

translation.en: He is our parish priest.
translation.zh: 他是我们的教区神父

translation.en: Fair enough. And after that night, would you say that you...
translation.zh:
很好 那晚之后 你能不能说你将女儿
全权交给了摩尔神父照顾？

translation.en: ...put your daughter entirely in Father Moore's care?
translation.zh:
你能不能说你将女儿
全权交给了摩尔神父照顾？

translation.en: Yes. We had done all we could.
translation.zh: 是的 我们已经尽力了

translation.en: We said she was in his hands now...
translation.zh: 我们说要把她托给神父照管

translation.en: ...body and soul.
translation.zh: 身体和灵魂都是

translation.en: Thank you. No further questions, Your Honor.
translation.zh: 谢谢 暂无其他问题 法官阁下

translation.en: Thank you, Mr. Rose. You may step down.
translation.zh: 谢谢 罗斯先生 证人可以走出证人席

translation.en: The defense calls Dr. Sadira Adani.
translation.zh: 被告方传唤沙迪娜阿达尼博士

translation.en: I am currently a professor of anthropology and psychiatry...
translation.zh: 目前我在西北大学担任人类学

translation.en: ...at Northwestern University.
translation.zh: 和精神病学教授

translation.en: Where did you receive your education?
translation.zh: 你在哪里上的学？

translation.en: At Yale, and then at Cambridge.
translation.zh: 先是耶鲁 然后是剑桥

translation.en: And what is your specific area of expertise?
translation.zh: 你的专业领域是什么？

translation.en: I study the spiritual experiences of people in various cultures...
translation.zh: 我研究过不同文化中人们的精神体验

translation.en: ...and the physiological and psychological changes...
translation.zh: 还有他们在经历这些事情时

translation.en: ...they undergo during these experiences.
translation.zh: 生理和心理上的变化

translation.en: Would it be accurate to say that you specialize in the study of possession?
translation.zh: 那么能说你是附体方面的专家吗？

translation.en: Yes. "Possession" is one term for a basic human experience...
translation.zh:
是的 “附体”一词
是指一种基本人类体验

translation.en: ...reported by a great number of people all around the world.
translation.zh: 世界各地的人们都记述过此事

translation.en: In my fieldwork, I've seen many people who experienced...
translation.zh: 在这个领域 我见过很多

translation.en: ...a sense of being invaded by an entity from the supernatural realm.
translation.zh: 感觉被超自然存在物入侵的人

translation.en: Why do you think Emily was invaded?
translation.zh: 你为何觉得艾米丽被入侵了？

translation.en: Why did this possession happen to her?
translation.zh: 为什么她会被附体？

translation.en: Based on my study of the case file...
translation.zh: 基于我对案件材料的研究

translation.en: ...I believe that Emily Rose was a hypersensitive.
translation.zh: 我认为艾米丽极度敏感

translation.en: A person with an unusual connection...
translation.zh: 她与某东西有着不寻常的联结

translation.en: ...to what Carlos Castaneda called "the separate reality."
translation.zh:
那东西被卡洛斯卡斯塔尼达称为
“分离现实”

translation.en: Hypersensitives are born different from everyone else.
translation.zh: 极度敏感者天生就与其他人不一样

translation.en: They can have visions of the future, or see the dead...
translation.zh: 他们能看到未来 或者看到亡魂

translation.en: ...and sometimes be uniquely susceptible...
translation.zh: 有时候特别容易受到

translation.en: ...to invasion by an entity that is alien to them.
translation.zh: 外来存在物的入侵

translation.en: Objection.
translation.zh: 反对

translation.en: On what grounds?
translation.zh: 基于什么理由？

translation.en: How about silliness, Your Honor?
translation.zh: 愚蠢如何？法官阁下

translation.en: A young girl suffered terribly and died.
translation.zh: 一个年轻女孩饱受折磨死去

translation.en: Do we have to subject her illness to this pseudoscientific analysis?
translation.zh: 为何要用伪科学方法分析她的病情？

translation.en: Both counselors, please approach the bench.
translation.zh: 两方律师 请过来一下

translation.en: Your Honor, this testimony is beyond ridiculous. Visions--
translation.zh:
法官阁下 证词简直是胡说八道
幻象…

translation.en: Supernatural belief systems are shared by millions of people. We're in The Twilight Zone here.
translation.zh:
-世上有很多人有同样的超自然信念
-我们在演《阴阳魔界》

translation.en: Her expertise is relevant to the issues in this case. Let's have a witch doctor sift through bones--
translation.zh:
-她的专长与本案问题相关
-那不如叫巫医来细究猴子骨…

translation.en: Stop.
translation.zh: 停下

translation.en: We've heard a great deal of testimony...
translation.zh: 我们听了很多证词

translation.en: ...in support of a medical explanation for Emily's condition.
translation.zh: 都是以医学解释艾米丽的情况

translation.en: Now we have a witness who has spent her career...
translation.zh:
现在的这位证人 毕生都在研究被告人所说的
第二种选择

translation.en: ...studying the defense's alternative explanation.
translation.zh:
毕生都在研究被告人所说的
第二种选择

translation.en: An exorcism expert, if you will.
translation.zh: 可说是驱魔专家

translation.en: I think we'll hear what she has to say.
translation.zh: 我想我们应该听听她要说的

translation.en: Thank you, Your Honor.
translation.zh: 谢谢 法官阁下

translation.en: Dr. Adani, why do you think Emily's exorcism failed?
translation.zh: 艾米丽的驱魔为何失败？阿达尼博士

translation.en: The medical treatment. Specifically, the drug Gambutrol.
translation.zh: 药物治疗 明确地说是冈布卓

translation.en: Please explain.
translation.zh: 请解释

translation.en: The exorcism ritual results in a specific brain activity...
translation.zh: 驱魔仪式会导致的特定大脑活动

translation.en: ...that cuts the person off from the possession experience.
translation.zh: 能够让受害者不再有被附体的感觉

translation.en: But Emily's exorcism could not have achieved this...
translation.zh: 但艾米丽的驱魔达不到这个效果

translation.en: ...because the doctor gave her Gambutrol...
translation.zh: 因为医生给她开的冈布卓

translation.en: ...which has an intoxicating effect on the brain.
translation.zh: 对大脑有麻醉作用

translation.en: The drug made her immune to the psycho-spiritual shock...
translation.zh: 使她免疫于驱魔原本能提供的

translation.en: ...that exorcism is intended to provide.
translation.zh: 精神及心灵上的震撼

translation.en: What do you believe was the result of treatment with this intoxicating drug?
translation.zh:
你认为这种令人陶醉的药
对驱魔造成了什么影响？

translation.en: Gambutrol locked Emily in the possessed state.
translation.zh: 冈布卓使艾米丽被固定在被附体状态

translation.en: This left her unable to respond to the exorcism...
translation.zh: 使她无法对驱魔仪式作出回应

translation.en: ...and therefore, it directly contributed to her death.
translation.zh: 因此直接导致了她的死亡

translation.en: No further questions.
translation.zh: 没有其他问题

translation.en: Erin!
translation.zh: （克雷桑县法院） 艾琳

translation.en: I've got a doctor who wants to testify.
translation.zh: 我找到愿意作证的医生了

translation.en: He's an eyewitness, Erin.
translation.zh: 他是目击证人 艾琳

translation.en: He was there. He was at the exorcism.
translation.zh: 他在场 目睹了驱魔仪式

translation.en: -What? -He called us.
translation.zh:
-什么？
-他给我们打的电话

translation.en: Dr. Graham Cartwright, Department of Abnormal Psychiatry...
translation.zh: 格拉哈姆卡特赖特医生 圣玛丽医院精神病部门的医生

translation.en: ...at St. Mary's Hospital.
translation.zh: 圣玛丽医院精神病部门的医生

translation.en: Dr. Cartwright. Ring a bell?
translation.zh: 卡特赖特医生 有印象吗？

translation.en: Yes.
translation.zh: 是的

translation.en: He was there?
translation.zh: 他在场？

translation.en: -Yes. -Father...
translation.zh:
-没错
-神父

translation.en: ...if you want me to defend you, you've got to give me...
translation.zh: 如果我要帮你辩护 你必须给我提供

translation.en: ...all the information I need.
translation.zh: 所有我需要的信息

translation.en: With all of this medical testimony helping the prosecution...
translation.zh: 医学方面的证词目前都对公诉方有利

translation.en: ...how could you not tell me that a doctor attended the exorcism?
translation.zh: 你怎么不告诉我有医生参加了驱魔？

translation.en: He asked that I keep his involvement confidential...
translation.zh: 他让我替他保密

translation.en: ...and I said I would.
translation.zh: 我说我会的

translation.en: Dr. Cartwright?
translation.zh: 卡特赖特医生？

translation.en: I recognize you from those courtroom drawings on the news.
translation.zh: 我是从新闻里的法庭照片上认出你的

translation.en: You're much prettier in real life.
translation.zh: 你真人更美

translation.en: -May I sit? -Yes, please.
translation.zh:
-我可以坐下吗？
-请坐

translation.en: You're losing.
translation.zh: 你要输了

translation.en: I had hoped Father Moore wouldn't need me...
translation.zh: 我本来希望摩尔神父用不上我

translation.en: ...but I don't wanna see him put away.
translation.zh: 但我不想看到他被关起来

translation.en: How do you know him?
translation.zh: 你怎么认识他的？

translation.en: Well, I was his parishioner at St. Vincent's Church... ...about 15 years ago.
translation.zh:
15年前
我是他在圣文森特教堂的教友

translation.en: I hadn't seen or heard of him for years when he called me last fall.
translation.zh:
去年秋天他给我打电话 我已很久没见过他
也没听到他的消息

translation.en: But he needed help, so....
translation.zh: 但他需要我的帮助 所以…

translation.en: What kind of help, doctor?
translation.zh: 什么样的帮助？医生

translation.en: He wanted a medical perspective from a psychiatrist...
translation.zh: 他需要一个精神病学家的医学观点

translation.en: ...you know, one that he knew, trusted...
translation.zh: 一个他认识 而且信任的人

translation.en: ...to observe Emily's physical and mental state during this....
translation.zh:
来观察艾米丽的生理精神状态
就在…

translation.en: During the exorcism.
translation.zh: 就在他进行驱魔的时候

translation.en: Yeah.
translation.zh: 是的

translation.en: Doctor.
translation.zh: 医生

translation.en: Doctor.
translation.zh: 医生

translation.en: Can you help our case?
translation.zh: 你能帮我们吗？

translation.en: That girl was not schizophrenic...
translation.zh: 那个女孩没有得精神分裂症

translation.en: ...and she was not epileptic, or any combination of the two.
translation.zh: 她也没得癫痫 也不是二者的结合

translation.en: I've seen hundreds of people with those problems.
translation.zh: 我见过成百上千有过这种问题的人

translation.en: They can be terrible afflictions, of course, but they don't scare me.
translation.zh: 身上会承受极大痛苦 但吓不到我

translation.en: But what you saw that night in Emily, that did scare you.
translation.zh: 但那晚你看到艾米丽 让你非常害怕

translation.en: God, if I'd known, I never would've been there.
translation.zh: 老天 如果我知道 我是绝不会去的

translation.en: I started praying again since then, you know.
translation.zh: 从那之后我又开始祈祷了

translation.en: I examined that girl before I drove back to the city that night.
translation.zh: 开车回市里那晚 我给她做了检查

translation.en: She was lucid...
translation.zh: 她头脑清楚

translation.en: ...and she was completely aware of this separate entity inside her.
translation.zh: 也知道自己体内的确有另一个存在物

translation.en: When she wasn't in his grip, she was totally herself, completely normal.
translation.zh:
他没有控制她的时候
她就是自己 非常正常

translation.en: The awareness of her alternate mental state is counterindicative of psychosis.
translation.zh:
能意识到自己的精神状态会交替
就说明她根本没有精神病

translation.en: Crazy people don't know they're crazy.
translation.zh: 疯人不自知的

translation.en: That's right.
translation.zh: 没错

translation.en: You'll testify to all of this, in detail?
translation.zh: 你会详细地陈述这些吗？

translation.en: Everything you saw?
translation.zh: 你目睹的所有事？

translation.en: Send me the case files and tell me when to be in court.
translation.zh:
把案子的文件给我
告诉我作证的时间

translation.en: Thank you, doctor.
translation.zh: 谢谢 医生

translation.en: We need this.
translation.zh: 我们很需要你的证词

translation.en: Before he was arrested, Father Moore sent this to me.
translation.zh: 摩尔神父被捕前 给了我这个

translation.en: He asked me to take care of it.
translation.zh: 他让我好好保管

translation.en: It's your burden now.
translation.zh: 现在交给你了

translation.en: One more thing. When you saw Emily...
translation.zh: 还有 你见到艾米丽时

translation.en: ...did Father Moore ask you to give her any medical help?
translation.zh: 摩尔神父让你给她开过药吗？

translation.en: He was already trying to stop her from injuring herself and urging her to eat.
translation.zh:
他已经试着阻止她伤害自己
并且劝她吃东西了

translation.en: And I told him, as a doctor, I couldn't help her.
translation.zh: 我跟他说 我这个医生帮不了她

translation.en: Dr. Cartwright's going to testify.
translation.zh: 卡特赖特医生决定要作证

translation.en: Don't you get it?
translation.zh: 你不懂吗？

translation.en: He's not just an eyewitness to the exorcism.
translation.zh: 他不仅仅是驱魔的目击者

translation.en: He can also refute the prosecution's medical case. This is huge for us.
translation.zh:
他更可以推翻公诉人的医疗案例
这对我们来说非常重要

translation.en: When do I get to testify?
translation.zh: 我何时作证？

translation.en: I don't know. Let's take this one step at a time.
translation.zh: 我不知道 走一步看一步吧

translation.en: No.
translation.zh: 不行

translation.en: What matters most is Emily's story, which only I can tell.
translation.zh:
最重要是艾米丽的故事
那只有我能讲

translation.en: I understand.
translation.zh: 我明白

translation.en: Have you thought about what I said before?
translation.zh: 你考虑过我之前说的吗？

translation.en: About dark forces and demonic attacks?
translation.zh: 黑暗力量和恶魔的袭击？

translation.en: Yes, I have.
translation.zh: 考虑过

translation.en: That day, after Briggs testified...
translation.zh: 那天 布里格斯医生作证后

translation.en: ...I was feeling awful.
translation.zh: 我感觉很差

translation.en: And I went out for a walk just to clear my head...
translation.zh: 我出去散步 理理头绪

translation.en: ...and I was thinking about what you said to me. Thinking:
translation.zh: 就想了你跟我说过的话 想着：

translation.en: "What if demons really do exist?"
translation.zh: “如果恶魔真的存在呢？”

translation.en: And wondering what that would mean if I believed that.
translation.zh:
还在想如果我相信这个
那意味着什么

translation.en: Because God knows, I have my own demons.
translation.zh: 因为…天知道 我内心也有恶魔

translation.en: And I saw something lying on the sidewalk.
translation.zh: 我看到什么东西在人行道上

translation.en: It was a gold locket...
translation.zh: 一个金色的吊坠

translation.en: ...with the initials E.C.B. engraved on it.
translation.zh: 吊坠上刻着“艾克布”

translation.en: My middle name is Christine.
translation.zh: 我的中间名是克丽丝汀

translation.en: Erin Christine Bruner.
translation.zh: 艾琳克丽丝汀布鲁勒

translation.en: And of all the people walking by that day, I found that locket.
translation.zh: 有那么多人经过 只有我看到了吊坠

translation.en: What are the chances of that?
translation.zh: 怎么可能这么凑巧？

translation.en: I don't know, maybe it was a sign.
translation.zh: 我不知道 或许就是个迹象

translation.en: Or maybe it was just some incredible coincidence.
translation.zh: 或是不可思议的巧合

translation.en: But it made me feel...
translation.zh: 但这让我感觉

translation.en: ...like no matter what mistakes I've made in the past...
translation.zh: 不管我过去犯过什么错

translation.en: ...at that moment, I was exactly where I was meant to be.
translation.zh: 那一刻 我觉得自己就在该在的地方

translation.en: Like I was on the right path.
translation.zh: 觉得自己在一条对的路上

translation.en: You sound more like a mystic than an agnostic.
translation.zh:
你的话更像神秘主义者说的
而不是不可知论者的论调

translation.en: Are you wearing the locket now?
translation.zh: 你戴着那个吊坠吗？

translation.en: No.
translation.zh: 没有

translation.en: You should.
translation.zh: 你该戴着

translation.en: The archdiocese doesn't want you to testify.
translation.zh: 大主教管区不想让你出庭

translation.en: They're just afraid that I'll embarrass them.
translation.zh: 他们怕我让他们丢脸

translation.en: Testify to some medieval-sounding supernatural nonsense.
translation.zh: 作证说见到了像中世纪的超自然事件

translation.en: They're expecting me to talk you out of it.
translation.zh: 他们想让我劝你不要出庭

translation.en: I've just decided I'm not even gonna try.
translation.zh: 我决定不做这样的尝试

translation.en: Why not?
translation.zh: 为什么不呢？

translation.en: If the archdiocese wants to avoid embarrassment...
translation.zh: 如果大主教管区想要不丢脸

translation.en: ...they need you to walk out of here a free man.
translation.zh: 那你必须以自由人身份走出这里

translation.en: I believe a jury will find you sincere and credible...
translation.zh:
我相信陪审团会认为
你是个真诚可信的人

translation.en: ...and when Dr. Cartwright corroborates your testimony...
translation.zh: 卡特赖特医生证实了你的证词

translation.en: ...and refutes the prosecution's medical arguments...
translation.zh: 推翻公诉人关于医学上的论据后

translation.en: ...we'll get an acquittal.
translation.zh: 我们可以获得无罪开释

translation.en: And everyone will thank me for it.
translation.zh: 所有人都会感谢我

translation.en: Emily!
translation.zh: 艾米丽

translation.en: God help me.
translation.zh: 上帝救我

translation.en: Do you swear to tell the truth, the whole truth, so help you God?
translation.zh:
你是否发誓说出实话
说出真相的全部 你只说实话 不说谎话？
愿上帝保佑你

translation.en: I do.
translation.zh: 我发誓

translation.en: Father Moore, before you could perform the exorcism...
translation.zh: 摩尔神父 你在实施驱魔前

translation.en: ...you had to get the sanction of the Church, correct?
translation.zh: 必须得到教会认可 对吗？

translation.en: Yes, on October the 27th of last year...
translation.zh: 是的 去年10月27号

translation.en: ...I presented my assessment and recommendation to the archbishop...
translation.zh: 我将评估和建议提交给了大主教

translation.en: ...and he authorized the exorcism that day before I left his office.
translation.zh: 当天我还没走出办公室 他就批准了

translation.en: Tell us what happened that night.
translation.zh: 告诉我们那晚发生了什么事

translation.en: I drove home.
translation.zh: 我开车回到家

translation.en: I sat up till after midnight studying The Roman Ritual...
translation.zh: 一直坐到午夜 研读《罗马仪式》

translation.en: ...thinking about what lay ahead.
translation.zh: 思考即将遇到的情况

translation.en: You mean The Roman Ritual of Exorcism.
translation.zh: 你是说《罗马驱魔仪式》

translation.en: A text used by Catholic priests...
translation.zh: 天主教牧师用的文本

translation.en: ...as a guide to performing the exorcism rite.
translation.zh: 是实施驱魔仪式的指引

translation.en: Yes, I think I actually fell asleep with the book in my hand.
translation.zh: 是的 书在手中 我就睡着了

translation.en: What happened next?
translation.zh: 之后发生了什么？

translation.en: I woke up, freezing.
translation.zh: 我醒了过来 浑身冰冷

translation.en: It was exactly 3 a.m.
translation.zh: 已经到凌晨3点钟了

translation.en: Three a.m. is the demonic witching hour.
translation.zh: 3点是恶魔邪术发生的时候

translation.en: It's a way for demons to mock the Holy Trinity.
translation.zh: 是恶魔嘲笑圣三一的时候

translation.en: It's an inversion of 3 p.m., the miracle hour...
translation.zh: 与下午3点的奇迹时刻正相反

translation.en: ...which is traditionally accepted as the hour of Christ's death.
translation.zh: 那传统上被认为是基督死去的时刻

translation.en: I thought I smelled something burning.
translation.zh: 我闻到了一股焦味

translation.en: Only later did I connect it...
translation.zh: 之后我才把它们联系起来

translation.en: ...and I remembered that that same smell of something burning...
translation.zh: 记起了当时艾米丽提到的事

translation.en: ...had been perceived by Emily.
translation.zh: 她也闻到一股焦味

translation.en: Holy Mary, mother of God, pray for us sinners, now and--
translation.zh: 圣母玛利亚 上帝之母 为罪人祈祷…

translation.en: Pray for us sinners, now and at the hour of our--
translation.zh: 为罪人祈祷 就在这个时刻…

translation.en: At the hour of--
translation.zh: 在这个时刻…

translation.en: What do you make of this gesture, this nod in your direction?
translation.zh: 你怎么看这个对着你点头的动作？

translation.en: I don't know. Some kind of acknowledgment, I guess.
translation.zh: 我不知道 可能是确认吧

translation.en: That the game is on.
translation.zh: 游戏开始了

translation.en: You're really God's gunslinger, aren't you, Father?
translation.zh: 你还真是上帝的枪手 是吗？神父

translation.en: Standing tall and facing the devil with your prayer book at your side.
translation.zh: 手拿祷告书 勇敢面对恶魔

translation.en: Objection, Your Honor. Counsel's harassing my witness.
translation.zh: 反对 法官阁下 对方骚扰证人

translation.en: Sustained. Mr. Thomas, you know I won't allow that in my courtroom.
translation.zh:
反对有效 托马斯先生
你知道我的法庭上不许出现这种情况

translation.en: Forgive me, Your Honor.
translation.zh: 请原谅 法官阁下

translation.en: Father, did you understand this black-robed figure to be the devil?
translation.zh: 神父 你认为穿黑袍的影子是恶魔？

translation.en: I believe it was a demonic manifestation.
translation.zh: 我相信这是恶魔力量的展示

translation.en: Like the demonic force you believe possessed Emily?
translation.zh:
就好像你相信的
附体在艾米丽身上的恶魔力量？

translation.en: -Yes. -Why do you think it appeared to you?
translation.zh:
-是的
-那它为什么来找你？

translation.en: I believe the demonic can appear as an apparition...
translation.zh: 恶魔可以以幽灵形象出现

translation.en: ...much like a ghost, in an attempt to excite our fear.
translation.zh: 像是鬼魂 为了激起恐惧

translation.en: -Did it excite your fear, Father? -It scared the hell out of me.
translation.zh:
-那你害怕了吗？神父
-我惊慌失措

translation.en: So this night, when you began to prepare Emily's exorcism...
translation.zh:
那么这一晚
你开始准备艾米丽的驱魔仪式

translation.en: ...was it your first encounter with this demon ghost?
translation.zh: 这是你第一次遇到恶灵吗？

translation.en: -Yes. -Have you seen it again?
translation.zh:
-是的
-之后有再见过吗？

translation.en: I've seen it ever since.
translation.zh: 之后就一直能见到

translation.en: No further questions at this time.
translation.zh: 暂无其他问题

translation.en: Redirect, Your Honor.
translation.zh: 重新提问 法官阁下

translation.en: Father Moore, after you received the bishop's authorization...
translation.zh: 摩尔神父 拿到大主教许可后

translation.en: ...when did you proceed with an exorcism?
translation.zh: 你什么时候进行了驱魔仪式？

translation.en: October 31st.
On Halloween. Isn't that a bit dramatic?
translation.zh: 万圣夜当天 不会很戏剧化吗？

translation.en: Halloween tradition is based on legends throughout history...
translation.zh: 万圣夜在历史上的来历是这样的

translation.en: ...that indicate a real increase in spiritual activity on that night...
translation.zh: 那一晚灵异活动的确会有所增加

translation.en: ...and I thought we could use the occasion to draw them into the open.
translation.zh: 我认为可以利用这个时机让他们显形

translation.en: -The demons, you mean? -Yes.
translation.zh:
-你是说恶魔吗？
-是的

translation.en: Father Moore...
translation.zh: 摩尔神父

translation.en: ...can you identify this?
translation.zh: 你能说明这是什么吗？

translation.en: It's my tape recorder. I used it to record the exorcism.
translation.zh: 我的录音机 录下了驱魔过程

translation.en: Inside is the tape I made that night.
translation.zh: 里面是那晚我录下的磁带

translation.en: Why would you make such a tape?
translation.zh: 你为什么要录下来？

translation.en: Ever since the technology has been available...
translation.zh: 技术的发达使得驱魔者能够用录音机

translation.en: ...exorcists have used tape recorders to authenticate the ritual...
translation.zh:
技术的发达使得驱魔者能够用录音机 来证实驱魔的真实性
并能够回溯当时情况

translation.en: ...and provide a record for review.
translation.zh:
来证实驱魔的真实性
并能够回溯当时情况

translation.en: I offer into evidence this cassette recorder and audiotape....
translation.zh:
-我提请将录音机和录音带加入证据
-反对 法官阁下

translation.en: Objection. The people were not aware of the existence of this tape...
translation.zh:
-我提请将录音机和录音带加入证据
-反对 法官阁下 我们不知道有这盘磁带

translation.en: -...until last night. -Neither were we.
translation.zh:
-直到昨晚
-我们也不知道 法官阁下

translation.en: This tape is new evidence that came into our possession yesterday.
translation.zh: 昨晚我们才拿到这个新的证据

translation.en: We provided counsel for the people with a transcript of its contents.
translation.zh: 我们为陪审团提供了内容的文字记录

translation.en: You mean this tape was not given to you by your client?
translation.zh: 你说这盘磁带不是委托人给你的？

translation.en: No, Your Honor. We received it from a reluctant witness...
translation.zh:
不 法官阁下
是不愿出现的目击证人提供的

translation.en: ...Dr. Graham Cartwright, who will also be called to testify to its authenticity.
translation.zh:
格拉哈姆卡特赖特医生
他也会被传唤来证实其真实性

translation.en: The people will find his name on the updated witness list...
translation.zh:
-法官阁下…
-他的名字会出现 在给陪审团的更新的证人名单上

translation.en: ...we provided to them this morning.
translation.zh: 今早我们才提交的

translation.en: Very well. I'll allow it into evidence.
translation.zh: 好 那么准许加入证据

translation.en: Father Moore.
translation.zh: 摩尔神父

translation.en: Will you play the tape for us now?
translation.zh: 能播放录音吗？

translation.en: This is the exorcism of Emily Rose.
translation.zh: 这是艾米丽罗丝的驱魔仪式

translation.en: Those present are myself, Father Richard Moore...
translation.zh: 在场的有我 理查德摩尔神父

translation.en: ...Nathaniel, Emily's father...
translation.zh: 纳撒尼尔 艾米丽的父亲

translation.en: ...Jason, her friend...
translation.zh: 杰森 她的朋友

translation.en: ...a doctor who is here to monitor Emily during the ritual...
translation.zh:
一位医生 他负责在驱魔期间
观察艾米丽的情况

translation.en: ...and Emily herself...
translation.zh: 还有艾米丽本人

translation.en: ...who has given her permission for the ritual to be performed.
translation.zh: 她允许我们为她驱魔

translation.en: All right, now listen.
translation.zh: 好了 听着

translation.en: You may say the rosary or any private prayer for her deliverance...
translation.zh:
在你没有响应我的话时
你可以为她的解脱诵念《玫瑰经》

translation.en: ...when you're not responding to my words.
translation.zh: 或者私下祈祷

translation.en: Above all...
translation.zh: 最重要的

translation.en: ...do whatever I ask, without question.
translation.zh: 就是按我的指示做 别问问题

translation.en: Don't ask it any questions...
translation.zh: 也不要问它问题

translation.en: ...or pay any attention to what it says.
translation.zh: 或者听信它说的话

translation.en: "It"?
We won't be dealing with Emily tonight.
translation.zh: 今天我们面对的不是艾米丽

translation.en: Restrain her.
translation.zh: 绑住她

translation.en: Lord Jesus Christ, have mercy on us.
translation.zh: 主耶稣基督 求你的怜悯

translation.en: It has begun.
translation.zh: 开始了

translation.en: Let us pray.
translation.zh: 祈祷吧

translation.en: "Because she hopes in you, my God."
translation.zh: “因她指望你 我主”

translation.en: "Send her help from the holy place, Lord."
translation.zh: “从圣灵之地给予她帮助吧 主”

translation.en: "And give her heavenly protection."
translation.zh: “给她神的庇护”

translation.en: "May the Lord be with you."
translation.zh: “愿主与你同在”

translation.en: "And with your spirit."
translation.zh: “与你的心灵同在”

translation.en: Our Father, who art in heaven, hallowed be thy name.
translation.zh: 我们在天的父 愿你的名被尊为圣

translation.en: My God. Are you all right?
translation.zh: 老天 你还好吗？

translation.en: Dolls and kisses and crosses and wishes...
translation.zh: 玩偶、亲吻、十字架、祈祷

translation.en: ...you think that can save your little girl?
translation.zh: 你以为这些就能救你的女儿？

translation.en: Thy kingdom come, thy will be done, on earth as it is in heaven.
translation.zh:
愿你的国度来临
愿你的旨意行在地上

translation.en: I'm fine.
translation.zh:
-如同行在天上
-我没事

translation.en: Give us this day our daily bread.
translation.zh: 我们日用的食粮 愿你今天赐给我们

translation.en: And forgive us our trespasses as we forgive those that trespass against us.
translation.zh:
愿你饶恕我们的亏欠
如同我们也饶恕了亏欠我们的人

translation.en: And lead us not into temptation--
translation.zh: 不要让我们陷入试探

translation.en: But deliver us from evil!
translation.zh: 救我们脱离那恶者

translation.en: Who are you, demon? Tell me your name.
translation.zh: 你是谁？恶魔 告诉我名字

translation.en: I am the one who dwells within....
translation.zh: 我是附在她体内的

translation.en: In the Name of Christ...
translation.zh: 以基督的名义

translation.en: ...identify yourself!
translation.zh: 自报家门

translation.en: One, two, three, four, five, six. One, two, three, four, five, six.
translation.zh: 一、二、三、四、五、六…

translation.en: Trick or treat. I give you treats and tricks.
translation.zh: 不招待就使坏 给你们点颜色瞧瞧

translation.en: One, two, three, four, five, six.
translation.zh: 一、二、三、四、五、六

translation.en: Father Moore!
translation.zh: 摩尔神父

translation.en: Papa!
translation.zh: 爸爸

translation.en: Emily!
translation.zh: 艾米丽

translation.en: Emily!
translation.zh: 艾米丽

translation.en: She feels so hot, Father! She's burning up!
translation.zh: 她很烫 神父 浑身滚烫

translation.en: Hold her down there on the straw! Hold her!
translation.zh: 抓住她…让她躺在稻草上

translation.en: Emily!
translation.zh: 艾米丽

translation.en: Doctor! I need you here now. Watch her vital signs.
